column4: Pichi:based on your specs I would recomend xubuntu or something lighter
xubuntu isn't much lighter then ubuntu anymore
sure it is. Xfce compaired to gnome is still a huge difference.
XFCE is lighter then Gnome but Xubuntu includes alot of things Ubuntu has so the full desktop isn't much lighter, doing a minimal install of XFCE will be lighter but not Xubuntu
